item.title: 003-20220608-After_Ambush
item.description: Summary We find a cave and sign which leads us to believe that Gundrin and his companions were takin prisoner. We enter free some Wolves, kill some goblins and find the prisoners.

item.title: Gundrin Rockseaker
item.description: Meta Race: Dwarf Job: Boss: Companion: [[Sildar]], Status: unkown Notes captured by the goblins taken to Crevmare Castle Was carrying a map to [[Wave_Echo_Cave]]
